pr_title: [Data-Plane Mgr] Support DHCP Programming for Port Creation

timeline.body: Let us use constant variables and collect them in one place so that we could easily change the value if needed.
timeline.bodyText: Let us use constant variables and collect them in one place so that we could easily change the value if needed.
timeline.bodyHTML: Let us use constant variables and collect them in one place so that we could easily change the value if needed.
timeline.author: xieus

timeline.bodyHTML:
Good to have an extra test case.

One side suggestion: The GoalStateManagerTest.java file becomes a huge file as more test cases are being added. Could you plan to split the payload of each test case with separate conf file, and maintain the main test file in a relatively short manner?

For example,

public void dhcpTest()
{
	String input = DHCPTestCase.INPUT;
	String output = DHCPTestCase.OUTPUT;
	check(input, output);
}

@haboy52581 We can do it in a follow-up PR if needed.
timeline.author: xieus

replies.bodyText: A tracking issue #360 has been created.
replies.author: xieus
